ORDER
PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
886 A.2d 1136
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Rebecca ARIAS, Appellant (Two Cases).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dee. 7, 2005.
Decided Dec. 21, 2005.
Jeanne Trivellini, David James Long, Erie, Glenn D. Welsh, Reading, for Rebecca Arias, appellant.
Mark Carlyle Baldwin, Reading, Alisa Rebecca Hobart, for the Com. of PA, appellee.
Before: CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
